text: geudeul-ege adam-ui jason-in du adeul-ui yaegileul jinsildoege illeojulahasyeoss-euni geudeul-i hananimkke jemul eul bachimae geudeul gaunde han jason-uigeos-eul sulagji anihaess-euni han jason i kkog naega neoleul salhaehalila hanidaleun jason-i hananim-eun jeong-uiloun jaui geos-eun bad-a jusinila hadeola
